text: Aapko pata hai, Mumbai jaise city mein hum roz bahar ka khana kha lete hain.
Time kam hota hai, options zyada hote hain.
But ek cheez jo quietly impact karti hai, wo hai food quality.
Mumbai jaise city mein hum roz bahar ka khana consume karte hain.
Ye immediately feel nahi hota, but dheere dheere health pe effect karta hai.
Taste important hai, but safety usse bhi zyada.
Clean places choose karna, fresh food khana aur basic hygiene notice karna,
Ye small steps aage jaakar big problems se bacha sakte hain.
Khane ko enjoy karo, but consciously.
